markdownRemark.html:
복잡도 (Complexity)

approximate measure of the efficiency of an algorithm

  • 시간 복잡도(Time Complexity): how much time takes in respect to input size
  • 공간 복잡도(Space Complexity): how much space takes in respect to input size

Asymptotic Notation

  • O(n): performance <= n
  • Θ(n): performance = n
  • Ω(n): performance >= n

Handy Math Formulae
